definitions.definition: An East Asian cultivar or subspecies of garden radish ( Raphanus raphanistrum subsp. sativus , syn. Raphanus sativus ) bearing a large , white , carrot - shaped taproot consumed throughout East and South Asia but grown in North America primarily as a fallow crop for its fast - growing leaves ( used as animal fodder ) and as a soil ripper .

subdefinitions.definition: The usual Japanese cultivar , Japanese radish .

definitions.definition: Closely - related cultivars such as the enormous turnip - shaped Sakurajima or green -and- red watermelon radish .

main_definition: An East Asian cultivar or subspecies of garden radish ( Raphanus raphanistrum subsp. sativus , syn. Raphanus sativus ) bearing a large , white , carrot - shaped taproot consumed throughout East and South Asia but grown in North America primarily as a fallow crop for its fast - growing leaves ( used as animal fodder ) and as a soil ripper .
secondary_definitions: Closely - related cultivars such as the enormous turnip - shaped Sakurajima or green -and- red watermelon radish .
